mention.text: israeli terrorists in colombia engaged in training right-wing paramilitary groups that , according to investigations , are financed by drug-trafficking mafias
several israelis engaged in that illegal activity

an israeli mercenary paid by the medellin cartel -- the world 's most powerful drug-trafficking mafia -- that appears to be directly linked to the murders of galan , a high-ranking police officer , and a judge last week
the country with israeli , british , u.s. and west german terrorist instructors
